question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object shaken by an agent for more than or equal to 14 seconds whose height is less than or equal to 0.73m?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:shake .
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y <= 0.73)
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 14)
            
                    }  }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.time: more than or equal to 14 seconds
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose height is less than or equal to 0.73m
qualifiers_en.question: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object?

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object squeezed by an agent, which is of the type Toothpaste, firstly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:squeeze .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Toothpaste .
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Toothpaste
qualifiers_en.question: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object?

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent firstly pours an object which is a subclass of Juice_2?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:pour .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Juice_2 .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Juice_2
qualifiers_en.question: What is the place?

question_text_en: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object opened by an agent whose type is Fridge firstly?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?pos_x ?pos_y ?pos_z WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:open .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Fridge .
                
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                    } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                    
                        ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                        ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                        ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                        ?state vh2kg:bbox ?bbox .
                        ?bbox x3do:bboxCenter ?pos .
                        ?pos rdf:first ?pos_x ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y ;
                            rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Fridge
qualifiers_en.question: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object?

question_text_en: What is the place where an agent switches off an object whose state is ON after 2024-04-18T08:43:00 and before or at 2024-05-22T07:33:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:switchOff .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:ON .
            
                    
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-04-18T08:43:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time <= "2024-05-22T07:33:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                    }  }
                    ?event vh2kg:place ?answer .
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is ON
qualifiers_en.question: What is the place?
